overview.en: Hai Yunxuan has become the world's first PHP development data sharing service provider by sharing PHP development technology to all industries through block chain technology and digital capitalization. Hai Yun Xuan has built a universal digital asset currency (HYX) for the global PHP development industry to cover global PHP development, software development, data maintenance, super technology and other costs.
overview.zh: HaiYunXuan通过区块链技术以及数字资产化将php开发技术共享给全部产业，成为全球第一的php开发数据共享服务商。HaiYunXuan针对全球php开发产业构建了一个通用的数字资产币（简称HYX），可用于支付全球性的php开发、软件研发、数据维护、超级技术等费用
